content.question: Which of the following responses was most likely acquired through classical conditioning?

choices.label: The startle response of a baby the first time the baby hears thunder
A child's fear of dogs after the child has been bitten by a dog
The uncontrollable blinking of a woman who has just gotten dust in her eye
The salivation of a dog that is halfway through a bowl of its favorite food

content.answer: A child's fear of dogs after the child has been bitten by a dog

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
